meanings.definition: To change the combination of a lock by replacing the keys.
meanings.sent1: She rekeys the lock after losing her keys.
meanings.sent2: He rekeys the front door after moving into a new house.
meanings.sent3: The locksmith rekeys the lock with a swift motion.
meanings.sent4: Rekeys the lock to ensure safety and peace of mind.
meanings.sent5: Remember to rekeys your lock regularly to prevent unauthorized access.

meanings.definition: To enter data into a computer system again in order to update or correct it.
meanings.sent1: He rekeys the information to make sure it's accurate.
meanings.sent2: The employee rekeys the sales figures for the monthly report.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally rekeys the wrong data and has to start over.
meanings.sent4: Rekeys the data to keep the records up to date.
meanings.sent5: Make sure to rekeys the information carefully to avoid errors.
